articles.author: Jamie Braidwood
articles.title: Wimbledon 2023 LIVE: Novak Djokovic equals Roger Federer record as quarter-finals continue - The Independent
articles.description: Wimbledon semi-finalists will be decided today as John McEnroe causes controversy
articles.content:
The Wimbledon quarter-finals continue today with a rematch of last years final taking place in the womens draw and Carlos Alcaraz competing in the pick of the mens matches.
Elena Rybakina will go up… [+5006 chars]
